issues.description: The template’s PersonService uses a List<Person> for its internal storage, but the solution’s PersonService uses a Set<Person>. This mismatch in the underlying collection type is not mentioned in the problem statement and could confuse students when comparing template code to the reference implementation.
issues.suggested_fix: Use the same collection type in both template and solution. For example, change the solution’s Set<Person> to List<Person> (or change the template’s List to Set) so that the internal field type matches across both repositories.
